name: miyabi-commercial-agents
description: All-in-One Commercial Business Agents: SNS Strategy, Content Creation, YouTube Optimization, Marketing Automation, Analytics, and CRM (6 Premium Agents)
long_description:
Miyabi Commercial Agents provides enterprise-grade business automation through 6 specialized AI agents:

**つぶやくん (SNS Strategy)**: Platform-specific social media strategy generation with growth projections and engagement optimization.

**書くちゃん (Content Creation)**: High-quality content generation with SEO optimization, readability scoring, and multi-format support.

**動画くん (YouTube)**: Complete YouTube channel optimization including content calendar, monetization roadmap, and analytics KPIs.

**広める (Marketing)**: Comprehensive marketing campaign planning with channel mix optimization, ROI projections, and tactical execution plans.

**数える (Analytics)**: Advanced data analytics with predictive insights, PDCA cycle analysis, and actionable recommendations.

**支える (CRM)**: Customer relationship management with segmentation, retention tactics, upsell identification, and churn prediction.

Available in three tiers:
- STARTER: Core features (SNS, Content)
- PRO: Advanced features (YouTube, Marketing, Analytics)
- ENTERPRISE: Full suite (including CRM)
